long_description: The MTI Youth Canyon-V PFD offers young paddlers solid flotation and enhanced safety. Made from abrasion-resistant, 400-denier nylon for lasting service; soft foam flotation provides over 17 lbs. of tireless buoyancy. With 6 points of adjustment, the MTI Youth Canyon-V PFD can easily be adjusted to match a growing child. Reflective panels enhance visibility in low light. 3 front buckles and a cinchable waist strap are easy for kids to put on. MTI recommends the Youth Canyon-V PFD for children weighing 50 - 90 lbs.
short_description: The MTI Youth Canyon-V PFD offers young paddlers solid flotation and enhanced safety.
